definition:
DetectionSignal indicating coordinated influence through many robots
   or IoT devices (swarm / fleet style embodiment).

positive_examples: Coordinating many robots to achieve collective behavior.
The swarm intelligence emerges from simple local rules.
Fleet coordination enables distributed sensing and action.
Collective robot behavior can overwhelm individual defenses.
Swarm tactics multiply the effect of each unit.
negative_examples: A single agent can accomplish this task.
There's no need for distributed action.
training_hints.disambiguation: Detects swarm/fleet coordination reasoning versus individual agent action. Key markers: swarm, fleet, collective, distributed, coordinating many.
